img_summary: The image depicts the **Xiang River Goddess Gourd**, a legendary item from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This gourd provides a moderate amount of **Burn Resistance** and grants **immunity to lava-covered terrain** for a short duration when used. It can be found in **The Webbed Hollow** near **The Verdure Bridge Shrine**, by following the path to a set of lanterns and a gate, where a group of chests contains the item.
